attributes.action: To petition the IOC to include Netball at the 2032 Brisbane Olympics
attributes.additional_details:
Why the UK Should Lead the Charge

Netball is one of the most popular team sports for women and girls in the United Kingdom, and now also for men. From school playgrounds to the Netball Super League, from community clubs to England’s world-class Roses, the sport continues to thrive.
Netball’s reach across the UK is remarkable:

If the Olympic Games are meant to represent the best of global sport, shouldn’t one of the UK’s most successful and empowering sports be included?
attributes.background: We would like the UK government to petition the International Olympic Committee (IOC) to include Netball as an Olympic sport at the  Olympics in 2032, Brisbane or earlier.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the International Olympic Committee.
